# Trump’s Second Term Is Already the Most-Failed Presidential Term in U.S. History.

By Eric Zuesse

[Eric’s Substack](https://ericzuesse.substack.com/)

December 30, 2025

The _New York Times_ **[Sunday top-right front page lead story on 28 December 2025](https://static01.nyt.com/images/2025/12/28/nytfrontpage/scan.pdf)** — headlined **[“For DOGE, Big Disruption Returned Meager Savings: Largest Claims Were Wrong and Real Cuts Were Small, Times Analysis Finds”](https://web.archive.org/web/20251228182833/https://static01.nyt.com/images/2025/12/28/nytfrontpage/scan.pdf)**, had been posted online on December 23rd under the headline **[“How Did DOGE Disrupt So Much While Saving So Little? The group’s biggest claims were largely incorrect, a New York Times analysis found. And its many smaller cuts added up to few savings.”](https://archive.ph/y0bHF)**

It opened:[![](https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/51nG0xPja4L._SL500_.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/1638077495?tag=lrc18-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)[The Big Book of Herbal...](https://www.amazon.com/dp/1638077495?tag=lrc18-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)Sams, TinaBest Price: $23.99Buy New $10.51(as of 08:11 UTC - Details)[![](https://www.lewrockwell.com/wp-content/mu-plugins/amazon-ad-link-lr/img/buy-from-tan.gif)](https://www.amazon.com/gp/aws/cart/add.html?AssociateTag=lrc18-20&SubscriptionId=AKIAIDE7MWL7UCS6TA4A&ASIN.1=1638077495&Quantity.1=1)

_Elon Musk’s Department of Government Efficiency said it made more than 29,000 cuts to the federal government — slashing billion-dollar contracts, canceling thousands of grants and pushing out civil servants._

_But the group did not do what Mr. Musk said it would: reduce federal spending by $1 trillion before October. On DOGE’s watch, federal spending did not go down at all. It went up._

_How is that possible?_

_One big reason
